channel.title: New To SCAR and scrip writing
channel.description:
Boy am I a total [u]noob[/u] I am looking at the scrips and going [i][b]"huh?"[/b][/i]
Is there a tutorial out there regarding [b]SCAR [/b] and script writing?
I am Totaly lost and could use all the help I can find......
Thanks

item.title: New To SCAR and scrip writing
item.dc:creator: @Janilabo Janilabo
item.description:
@Janilabo wrote:

uncfan should get punished some how(USE THE BAN HAMMER PLEASE!). Welcome to board, hammer! Hopefully you’ll enjoy your stay.

Did you download SCAR from HERE? Just to be sure you didn’t google SCAR and download it from somekind of scamming site.

You should check out the tutorial section(eh, well just like hammer said… :S), as there is few nice tutorials. You’ll sure learn some nice tricks with em. Also, driger1592’s tutorial project definitely worth checking.

Good luck.

Edit: Noticed that you already took a look for drigers project… Great!

Read full topic
item.source: New To SCAR and scrip writing

item.description:
@hammer96080 wrote:

hey thnx, and sry i found that link later after i got some sleep…

Am still new to this site also plz be patient… and for ur info I am married and have kids…

item.dc:creator: @Cheesehunk Cheesehunk
item.description:
@Cheesehunk wrote:

[quote=“uncfan1119, post:2, topic:15456”]God ur so gay, look at the fuckin board titles labeld Scar FAQ and Tutorials.

moparisthebest.com

moparisthebest.com

programming, irc, cars

Nub[/quote]
Don’t be mean to the new people… we are noob friendly here. Clearly, this guy is trying to learn how SCAR works, on like many other members. All new scripters are welcome.
